content.question: Archaeological evidence suggests that the Apollo 11 stones in Namibia

choices.label: were widely copied by subsequent peoples
were influenced by European Paleolithic artists
are among the earliest known rock paintings in Africa
depict a mature style relative to earlier cave paintings

content.answer: are among the earliest known rock paintings in Africa

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
